mapper.sql: FROM board a JOIN infrMember b on a.infrMmSeq = b.infrMmSeq WHERE 1=1
mapper.select:
SELECT a.bdSeq ,b.infrMmNickname ,a.bdTitle ,a.bdContent ,a.bdDiv ,a.regDatetime ,a.delNy
ORDER BY a.bdSeq DESC
SELECT a.* ,b.infrMmNickname FROM board a JOIN infrMember b on a.infrMmSeq = b.infrMmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND bdSeq = #{bdSeq}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board ( infrMmSeq ,bdDiv ,bdTitle ,bdContent ,regDatetime ,delNy ) VALUES ( 1 ,#{bdDiv} ,#{bdTitle} ,#{bdContent} ,now() ,1 )
SELECT last_insert_id()
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET delNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND bdSeq = #{bdSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName FROM sgworld.boardUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{bdSeq} ORDER BY type, sort
SELECT a.cmSeq ,b.infrMmNickname ,a.content ,a.regDatetime FROM bdComment a JOIN infrMember b on a.infrMmSeq = b.infrMmSeq JOIN board c on a.board_seq = c.bdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND c.bdSeq = #{bdSeq}
